entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • O programa "[20588] MauiApp1.exe" foi fechado com o código 2147942405 (0x80070005). #13211
  • FilePicker: A device attached to the system is not functioning. (0x8007001F) #13207
    Backlog
  • Can not run the app #13203
  • [WinUI] CollectionView has default native PointerOver state which cannot be removed #13197
    Backlog
  • avoid use implicit-conversion operators for shell #13190
    Backlog
  • TapGestureRecognizer not respecting the NumberOfTapsRequired property #13189
    Backlog
  • [Regression] CarouselView with Loop="False" containing ScrollView does not resize to reveal newly visible items #13188
    Backlog
  • [Android][Mac Catalyst] ScrollView with Orientation Both cannot scroll both directions (missing scrollbar) #13187
    Backlog
  • [Maps] [Android] Registering for CameraMove events in a custom MapHandler disables Map.VisibleRegion.Center #13186
    Backlog
  • [Android] [Regression] NavigationPage.TitleView with ScrollView causes: (1) crashes, and (2) blank pages with stuck ToolbarItems #13185

Closed

  • On Windows (WinUI) Minimize, Normal, Maximize buttons behave strangely #7751
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Set underlying sdk version to a lower version #13183
  • Opened in error #13212
  • [Android] [Regression] CarouselView throws unhandled java.lang.RuntimeException paging through images - Canvas: trying to use a recycled bitmap #13182
  • Images in common MAUI resources, are not accessible by resource id in Android platform code #13151
  • ObservableProperty causes build error #13191
  • OnAppearing not triggered when going back from Modal page #8513
    .NET 8 Planning
  • OnAppearing not called if returning from a modal page to a modal page #11498
    Backlog
  • [Bug] XAML Hot Reload throwing error on LinearGradientBrush code #2968
  • CollectionView SelectionChangedCommand does not invoke if Button is the root element of the datatemplate #8608
    Backlog
  • Shell.Toolbaritems don't appear on iOS #13198
  • How to switch AndroidManifest.xml for multiple Android builds. #13155

PullRequests

Created

  • When measuring FlexLayout unconstrained, allow child to be desired size #13216
  • [MacOS/iOS] Fixed incorrect color of RadioButton in Dark Mode using Default Control Template. #13215
    area/controls 🎮
  • Add NotNullWhen to IsAlive() #13214
  • Add more tests for Graphics #13208
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Wire up WebView2 to window life cycle #13206
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix back button tap for older iOS APIs #13204
  • [build] use stable bits in main #13201
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Correctly set the Slider ThumbImageSource #13194
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-slider

Merged

  • [Windows] Add convenience and nullable safe method. #13205
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Close open cursors correctly #13202
  • Don't auto-close s/move-to-vs-feedback issues #13209
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix a couple life cycle scenarios on shell modals #13177
    area/lifecycle 🔁, area/shell 🐢
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13184
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Maps from 118.1.0 to 118.1.0.1 #13163
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Merge main into net8.0 #13166
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.Firebase.AppIndexing from 120.0.0.10 to 120.0.0.11 #13164
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] backport of #13171 #13179

Updated

  • Simplification of user interface declaration in code #12728
    proposal/open, community ✨
  • [build] pass $(RestoreConfigFile) to Workloads.csproj #13180
    area/setup 🪄
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    area/modal
  • Fix setting bottom tab icon title #12889
    area/shell 🐢
  • Fix net8 TODOs in code #12577
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • feat: Added nullable annotations for IValueConverter. #13173
    community ✨
  • Obsolete some of the AutomationProperties #13104
    area/a11y
  • [Windows] Fix Shell FlyoutBackground property #13132
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS] Fix issue rendering Button Background gradient with shadow #13022
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Fix crash setting SelectedTabColor on TabbedPage #12924
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/TabbedPage
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Changes how propagate brushes changes #12714
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix Shell TitleView rendering issues on iOS 16 #12834
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢, version/ios-16, control-titleview
  • [Windows] Fix issue with caching the page that holds unfocused control #13028
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟
  • Correctly handle ContainerView changes #13114
  • [iOS] Better Find Next Textfield Algo #13174
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 8.0-preview2
  • Remove Compatibility packages by default #13165
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, backport/NO
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending changes in Android AlertManager #11989
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • [Windows] Close the WebView2 disconnecting the Handler #12925
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Avoid to disconnect a disposed PlatformView on Android #12881
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [All platforms] Notify changes in CollectionView Layouts #13137
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.2 to 4.14.2.1 #13162
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Fix flyout offset measurements #12480
    area/shell 🐢
